===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|あめ|yomi=k}}
Cognate with {{m|ja|雨|tr=same||rain}}. Found both alone and in compounds. Perhaps derived from {{IPAchar|/same/}} → {{IPAchar|/ame/}} with loss of the initial {{IPAchar|/s/}}; see ''same''.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[á̠.me̞]|lang=ja}}
* {{ja-accent-common|a|あ|め}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あめ}}

# [[rain]]
#* 一雨ごとに春が来る
#*: hito ame goto ni haru ga kuru
#*:: Spring nears by each rain-fall
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|1|24}}
#*: 雨 設文云、雨、音禹、'''阿女'''○山田本有和名二字、谷川氏曰、'''阿女'''天水之急呼、謂如水從天下也、水從雲中而下也

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|さめ|yomi=k}}
Cognate with {{m|ja|雨|tr=ame||rain}}. Found in compounds. The {{IPAchar|/s/}} either represents [[w:epenthesis|epenthesis]] between two vowels in compounds or, more likely, is a reflex of an older form of the word only maintained in fossilized compounds. See the list of derived terms.

====Pronunciation====
* {{IPA|[sá̠.me̞]|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|さめ}}

# [[rain]]
